formParams.name: showLinkMeta
formParams.description: show OGP data of URL included in message. default value: true

formParams.name: ignoreHashtag
formParams.description: A value indicating whether hashtags in the message should be tags. default value: false

formParams.name: fileKeys
formParams.description: attachment file key (refer to Upload attachment file), maximum count: 5

formParams.name: talkIds
formParams.description: Tag IDs that you want to put the message in, maximum count: 5

formParams.name: attachments[0].fileUrl
formParams.description: Each message can have max. 5 file URLs (max. 10MB per file).

formParams.name: attachments[0].fileName
formParams.description: Unless the parameter specifies otherwise, filenames are automatically generated from the file URL. (maximum count: 5)
